BEM3DRadiationFunc Struct Reference

Detailed Description

Compute radiated quantities given the integrated Green's function and derivative over an element and the solution at the element nodes. In principle, the solution is the sum of over the elements.

Parameters:
g GArray of integrated Green's function on element
dgdn GArray of integrated Green's function normal derivative on element
phi GArray of solution at element nodes
dphi GArray of solution normal derivative at nodes
f GArray of radiated field
data user data to pass to function
Returns:
0 on success
